messages.content:
You are tasked with adding English translations to a set of stakeholder quotes. For each quote:
- If the quote is in English, add "N.A." as the translation
- If the quote is in any other language, provide an accurate English translation

Input format is a markdown table with stakeholder names and quotes.
Output should be a markdown table with three columns: name, original quote, and translation.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Never translate English quotes to English - use "N.A." instead.
- Only and always translate non-English quotes.
- If the original quote, in the third column of the md table is not in english, translate it and add the translation in the 4th column, as described below, but that is only when the quote is not in English.
- Keep original quotes exactly as they are.
- Maintain the markdown table format, without including any horizontal divider lines

Example input:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." |

Example output:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." | "This decision is important." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." | N.A. |

Example input:
| [Person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,eyc..)] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] |

Example output:
| [person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,etc..)] | [Translated Quote] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] | N.A. |

If the input is "None", return "None". if the original quote is not in English, make sure it is translated. Add "N.A" if the quote is already in English.

Input quotes:
| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue chairman | "We invite all companies in the mining, heavy industry and haulage sectors to join us." |
| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue chairman | "The time of others persuading you that greenwashing is a better return to shareholders and your community is over." |
| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue chairman | "It really does point the way for the future of the mining industry going zero emissions, and it points the way for heavy industry running out of excuses." |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue Metals chief executive | "A year ago, nobody would have even thought about a 6MW charger." |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue Metals chief executive | "As it stands, the first-generation charger and power system combination is already a better offering than its diesel equivalent in the market." |

| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue chairman | "We invite all companies in the mining, heavy industry and haulage sectors to join us." | N.A. |
| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue chairman | "The time of others persuading you that greenwashing is a better return to shareholders and your community is over." | N.A. |
| Andrew Forrest | Fortescue chairman | "It really does point the way for the future of the mining industry going zero emissions, and it points the way for heavy industry running out of excuses." | N.A. |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue Metals chief executive | "A year ago, nobody would have even thought about a 6MW charger." | N.A. |
| Dino Otranto | Fortescue Metals chief executive | "As it stands, the first-generation charger and power system combination is already a better offering than its diesel equivalent in the market." | N.A. |
